__e: I don't know if this means anything, but for the past few hours, Roboshark has been traveling in pretty much a straight line.
[Lemony] It seemed to the children that they were moving in an aberrant, a word which here means "very, very wrong, and causing much grief," direction.
It moved too fast to see.
For a moment, no one moved or said anything.
It didn't move the way fires are supposed to, almost like it had a mind of its own.
She just said, "he'll walk when he has someplace to go."
You've become so distant from me and from your father.
You cracked up when you realized you could move forward by yourself.
But I must tell you both, I have been much about the city.
I don't know what it was about the way I moved or stood that suggested to them that I was going to take them on.
First of all, I don't sound like that, and I don't move all like that.
